com.jwetherell.augmented_reality.ui.objects

Class PaintablePosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jwetherell.augmented_reality.ui.objects.PaintableObject
      • com.jwetherell.augmented_reality.ui.objects.PaintablePosition

  • public class PaintablePosition
extends PaintableObject
    This class extends PaintableObject and adds the ability to rotate and scale.
    Author:
    Justin Wetherell

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public void set(PaintableObject drawObj,
       float x,
       float y,
       float rotation,
       float scale)
        Set this objects parameters. This should be used instead of creating new objects.
        Parameters:
        drawObj - Object to set for this Position.
        x - X coordinate of the Position.
        y - Y coordinate of the Position.
        rotation - Rotation of the Position.
        scale - Scale of the Position.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if PaintableObject is NULL.

      • move

        Move the object.
        Parameters:
        x - New X coordinate of the Position.
        y - New Y coordinate of the Position.
